Articles.Content:
If you just want a simple (15 part) craft to get a man into orbit and back for the cost of the fuel, with fuel to spare, that handles nicely, then try the Starstreak...

Craft file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9l0zx72lawpglm2/Starstreak%20SSTO%201.craft?dl=0

Making orbit is just: Take off and point it at 25Ã‚Â° pitch until you get to the orbit Ap you want then circularize. That's pretty much all there is to it.

Coming home is easy too: Do a retro burn aiming for the KSC, hit the brakes to deploy the air brakes, when slowed close the airbrakes, then just pop the airbrakes again over the runway and it will drop onto the tarmac.

Edited October 27, 2015 by Foxster
That's got to be one of the smallest SSTO's I've seen! Well done!
That's a pretty neat SSTO. Good job!

Of course, it would be useful with a payload...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I love Compact craft for some reason, this is nice.
And with a payload to boot!!...hahaha! Really nice and nifty little craft!
I liked the ship!, in all aspects, is small, and now I will try it ...
